it.unica.foresee

Class Foresee

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.unica.foresee.Foresee

  • public class Foresee
extends java.lang.Object
    Main class to run the Foresee framework.

    Possible arguments are:

    • -h --help: Shows help message
    • -p --path: Path to the instruction file folder
    • -i --interactive: Interactive Mode (default)
    Options:
    • -v --verbose: Enable verbose output
    • -l --legacy: Enable the legacy ART parser

    Accepted extensions for the instructions file are the following:

    • .fs
    • .foresee
    • .ins
    • .instruction

      • mainHelper

        public static int mainHelper(java.lang.String[] args)
        Actual main method which runs the program. While having this method and the #main() may seem redundant, this choice is done to make testing the methods of this class easier.
        Parameters:
        args - command line arguments
        Returns:
        exit status

                                  boolean verbose,
                                  java.io.File instructionsFile)
        Loads the instruction file and runs the interpreter.
        Parameters:
        legacy - flag for legacy interpreter
        verbose - flag for verbose mode
        instructionsFile - file containing the instructions to run
        Returns:
        the exit status

      • askFileToLoad

        public static java.io.File askFileToLoad(boolean verbose,
                                         java.io.File instructionsDir)
        Asks the user which file to load among those in the current path.
        Parameters:
        verbose - flag for verbose mode
        instructionsDir - folder containing instructions files
        Returns:
        selected file containing instructions to run, if no file was available, returns null
